role_definition: Handles the oversight and configuration of the PBX (telephony/voice) access channel. This includes assessing capacity, performance, scheduling maintenance and updates to the channel configuration. Also determining allowed access and usage and troubleshooting major production problems
example_of_use: Management review and define the reconfiguration requirements for the voice channel based on capacity/volume projections
executive_summary: Oversee the configuration and operation of the voice channel facilities
key_features: Determine the required voice channel platform configuration
Track service availability and troubleshoot major production issues
